Posts.Content: Hi Elica, I had a full mastectomy one week ago, i have only just gor out of hospital yesterday, i had reconstruction at same time, and had 2 drains left in all week, if you could see the fluid that came out of me into there im not suprised you have a bit of swelling bless you, but it soon dispurses so i am told, i am glad you are feeling better though, i have had no exersize to do, but apart from a bit of stiffness i have full use of both my arms in fact cannot get my head round how normal i feel as i thought i would be in alot more pain, maybe its the slight fluid retention causing the problem with your arm. with love katyx
Posts.Title: Fluid after mastectomy
